name: U.F.O. Salicylic Acid BHA Treatment Face Oil
about: Which skin type is it good for?.What it is:.Solutions for:.If you want to know more….What it is formulated WITHOUT:.What else you need to know:
ingredients: Silybum Marianum (Milk Thistle) Seed Oil, Nigella Sativa (Black Cumin) Seed Oil, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Seed Oil, Diisopropyl Sebacate, Punica Granatum (Pomegranate) Seed Oil, Vaccinium Macrocarpon (Cranberry) Seed Oil, Dimethyl Isosorbide, Linum Usitatissimum (Flax) Seed Oil, Caprylic/Capric Triglycerides, Ethyl Linoleate, Hexylresorcinol, Glycyrrhiza Glabra (Licorice) Root Extract, Salicylic Acid, Prunus Armeniaca (Apricot) Kernel Oil, Chamomilla Recutita Flower Oil, Citrus Aurantium Amara (Neroli) Flower Oil, Melaleuca Alternifolia (Tea Tree) Leaf Oil, Helianthus Annuus Seed Oil, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Citrus Paradisii (Grapefruit) Peel Oil, Melia Azadirachta (Neem) Leaf Extract, Melia Azadirachta (Neem) Flower Extract, Coccinia Indica Fruit Extract, Amino Esters-1, Amber Leaf Extract, Solanum Melongena (Eggplant) Fruit Extract, Aloe Barbadensis Flower Extract, Lawsonia Inermis (Henna) Extract, Ocimum Sanctum Leaf Extract, Ocimum Basilicum (Basil) Leaf Extract, Curcuma Longa (Turmeric) Root Extract, Corallina Officinalis Extract, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Pearl Powder, Moringa Pterygosperma Seed Oil...The list of ingredients is subject to change. Please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Can be used day or night. .-After cleansing skin, massage in U.F.O. as needed. ..Pro tips:.-Layer on top of Martian Mattifying Melting Water-Gel toner for more oily skin support. .-Follow with a brightening treatment, like Tidal Brightening Enzyme Water Cream to help combat the appearance of acne discoloration. .-Mix three to four drops of U.F.O. into foundation before application to give hydrating, acne-fighting power to your makeup routine.    ... Precautions:.-As with all salicylic acid products, please consult with your doctor before use if you are pregnant or allergic to salicylates (like aspirin). .-Not intended for use by children. .-Using other topical acne drugs at the same time or right after use of this product may increase dryness or irritation of the skin.

reviews.review_text: I do not have acne per se, but sometimes my skin is just a little textured/bumpy and dull. This is great for clearing up overall small bumps on dry skin. It would probably be too much for my dry skin to use it constantly, but I do use it daily until the jar is finished.   It has an herbal, medicinal scent, but not unpleasant. It is an oil, which is good for my dry skin, but I also still need a moisturizer over it at night.

reviews.review_text: I love this for oil cleansing and back acne. Scent isn’t bad, but took some getting used to. Expensive but lasts a while. I do not use soap on my face. Works well to remove dirt, sunscreen and make-up too. I don’t like leaving this on my face without wiping off, but I do leave it on my back (for bacne).

reviews.review_title: Find BHA's/Salicylic Acid too harsh? Try this!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Take almost every natural ingredient that I love and throw them all into one product, and you have this! I was 'sold' the instant I laid my eyes on the ingredients list, and I'm happy to confirm the product completely lives up to it too: this reduces any random (mild) acne I get within a day or two, and it also lightens any discoloration left once they've died down. Additionally I find it clarifies congestion and dullness, both of which my skin is very prone to - especially my nose/inner cheeks area, and all I'm using is about 2-3 drops on an evening over my face, and letting it sink in and work its magic overnight. If you've used 'Salicylic Acid' for acne/pores in the past but found it too drying, I would suggest trying this. Most SA containing products are in a water/alcohol base whereas this is mainly oils and doesn't have that drying or stripping effect. The fragrance of this product is a fairly noticeable herbal/medicated smell, but honestly I barely notice it any longer  - although I appreciate it definitely won't be for everyone, the same applies to the product itself: you're either gonna love it or hate it. I've been a fan of 'Good Genes' by this brand, for some time, but this product (for me at least) blows that one out of the water. Yes it's pricey but considering how little of a dent I've made in the 0.5 fl oz (15 ml) size, I can justify the investment as it's not one I'll be needing to make that often...once or twice a year perhaps.  ~ My Sephora Top 7 must-have list ~  (My top 7 must-have beauty products of all time, focusing mainly on my purchases at Sephora)  1. reviews.review_title: Worth every dime, repeat buyer, won't go without!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My skin: tiny bumps all over my forehead, and big pimples around jawline, neck, and ears. Oily t zone,  but dry cheeks, jawline.   This product smoothed out my forehead bumps completely, and I haven't had any big pimples anywhere in months!!! The oil feels thick/heavy for a couple minutes, but it penetrates into skin and dries and you cant even tell its there. I typically put a few drops onto clean finger tips, and tap all over clean face especially trouble spots, and after about 1-2 weeks my skin was fully clear. This product layers well, and does not affect my makeup at all. Smells like tea tree oil, and the smell does not linger. This product is amazing and even though it's expensive, I will buy it over and over again. The large bottle usually lasts me about 2 months with daily use, but I have started applying every other day  so I think its definitely possible to make a bottle last longer. So far, my skin hasn't flared up or had outbreaks with every other day applications. If you're on the fence, try the small bottle and give it at least a week or 2 to see results. I'm so glad I tried this. I was NOT paid for this review, I purchased the product with my own money.

reviews.review_text: I've been eyeing this product for years, the main deterrent being the price tag. I finally decided to get it and I'm so happy I did. The smell is a bit medicinal, but that didn't really bother me. It takes a bit to absorb, so I prefer to put it on at night. When I've put it on during the day, my face feels a little oily but it goes away after thirty minutes or so. I've been using this in combination with a retinoid, and my skin looks great. No more red, blotchy skin and my acne is going away. I know everyone is different, but girls with PCOS, this might be for you. I've tried other salicyclic acid treatments to address my PCOS acne, but this is the first one that I've felt really helps.

reviews.review_text: Wow! I have been using this for only one week and I have already seen immense improvement in my stubborn, cystic acne. I am 29 and I have had acne since my late teens. It does not break me out or cause whiteheads like many products I have tried, and it simply feels really nice on my skin. The oil really balanced out the drying effect of the Salicylic Acid so I'm not dry and flakey either. As many other reviewers have noted, there is a noticeable smell to the product. I actually find it quite pleasant and earthy (like tea tree, vegetation, licorice) but I understand that many might find it off-putting. In my experience the smell fades in 30 minutes to an hour after applying. I will be buying the larger bottle when this one runs out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Having dry acne prone skin is a struggle like no other bc for some reason brands always assume acne prone = oily which isn't always the case. This was a miracle for me. It does a great job at clearing breakouts. It leaves your skin very very soft. I find this product kind of ironic because people with acne prone skin are often taught to never use oils on their face because they can clog pores and cause breakouts- but this one does the very opposite.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used this with the SATURN mask and OMG I am not exaggerating when I say I immediately saw a difference.  I used the mask as spot treatment and rinsed with water after about 20-30 minutes.  THE REVIEWS for the mask are unfair regarding the smell; it’s not that bad. at all. but i the complaints are UNDERSTANDABLE regarding the quantity because it is not that much for $20 but it was DEFINITELY worth it to me & if the price doubled, I’d still buy it!!!!! I first washed my face with the ceramic slip cleanser as instructed. Then I shook i up the mask so it mixed really good and applied as a spot treatment and rinsed with water.  IMPORTANT I saw great results once rinsed but when I say, I saw freaking amazing fantastic results “after” applying the A+ high dose retinol serum (one pump) followed by the UFO acne treatment face oil (two pumps) then the luna sleeping night oil (two pumps) I swear I CANNOT STOP STARING IN THE MIRROR because it seems almost impossible that two hours later it looks like my acne disappeared… basically it appears as if the pimples have either disappeared completely or appear to be 95% reduced. I soooo regret not taking before and after pictures. I did this at night and I sure do hope the acne does not reappear in the morning because this just seems too good to be true. I mean wtf, I am amazed amazed amazed. The lady that helped me at sephora swore by the UFO oil and I am so glad I bought it.  I initially went in to buy the UFO oil and this saturn mask and asked her if she recommended the UFO oil or the multivitamin oil and she swore by the UFO oil and it did not disappoint. ps I really have moderate acne every few months or so but when I don’t have acne,  I am in love with their WAKE UP WITH ME morning routine & the GO TO BED WITH ME evening routine…

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was terrible. Please save your money this doesn’t work. I waited 2 months before writing a review but I have not seen any results. It breaks your whole face out in little white dots in the beginning. They go away after a week. But the acne I had prior to use didn’t go away but got worse. I even lessened the application but still nothing. I hope you guys take into consideration my review especially if your are a WOC Bc I’m starting to think it might not be made for our skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Broke me out almost immediately. And I don’t k ow why because my skin loves BHAs and AHAs.  The smell and texture were lovely, though. Sad that it didn’t work for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This has been a game changer for my skin. I had so much congestion and texture on my forehead, cheeks, chin. I’ve been using this oil nightly for 3-4 weeks now and my skin is much smoother and less congested. Hormonal breakouts are less both in number and depth. Way less swollen and much closer to the surface. This means I pick at my skin less, which is great. I have normal skin, with some damage from past breakouts and I don’t find this oil to be oily or too rich for my skin. Will repurchase for sure.

reviews.review_title: been using it for years now and I still love it
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this stuff for nearly 4 years now and it’s a staple in my skincare routine. It has helped get rid of my problem areas and maintain clear skin! Anytime I run out I go into a frenzy and run to the nearest Sephora. People need to get over the smell because it isn’t that bad and your skin will thank you!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE THIS OIL. It is the only thing that has worked on the blackheads on my nose. I mix it with the skinfix moisturizer and it is the perfect combo.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Couldn't love this stuff any more. The perfect finishing oil, especially for those who are afraid to use oils. This makes my skin glow and it's nice to have an oil that does something other than attempt to moisturize.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this product. I am usually weary of oils because of my oily skin, but I love how soft this makes me feel and how well it tackles acne. Plus, I am in love with the smell

reviews.review_title: Did not work for my skin, still a great product
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was my first product from Sunday Riley. It was recommended to me by the Real Skincare Discussion.  I started to get more acne and breakouts as I got older, but I was put on prescription creams for them. I believe this is why my skin disliked this serum.  I started very slowly with a small patch test, and when I worked up to my whole face, I broke out everywhere.  Although I used the prescription cream and this serum at opposite times of the day, I think it was simply too much for my skin.  Either that or my face cannot tolerate one or more of the ingredients.  However, I have found that if I use it on body acne as a light spot treatment, it does help with size and redness.  I have been using the serum on my boyfriend’s face instead (always putting it in my clean hands first) and any breakouts, clogged pores and blackheads have noticeably improved with this.  He gets compliments on his skin all the time, but I don’t get any of the credit for introducing him to this or any type of skincare routine at all lol.  Overall, definitely a great product to try if you have acne, blackheads, clogged pores and would like to clear up your skin without stripping it of moisture.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was really skeptical in the beginning but started using this product in the form of just adding two-three drops on pea-sized moisturizer. This has really calmed down my acne, inflamed pimples, darkness caused due to over-the-counter acne topicals. I use it twice a day along with the moisturizer. I make sure not to include anything else with salicylic acid as this product already has enough of it. It does take time but this product is worth your time, money and effort. My skin is combination with more towards drier side this time due to acne flare-up.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: UFO definitely performs differently than the other oils I've used within the Sunday Riley line. It doesn't glide as easily as Luna or CEO it's still a dry oil but definitely has to be pat in versus smoothing over the skin. It tends to sting a bit and it takes more time to dry down leaving the skin a bit sticky. I use this in the evening. hoped to see more dramatic results the morning after applying but it is not as effective in eliminating blemishes as some of the other products in the line. It does noticeably lift whiteheads/blackheads to the surface helping the pores to force them out. I find it works better if I use this during the day but the stinging is just not ideal.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This serum is totally worth the price! It goes on like an oil but doesn’t make my skin feel greasy or break me out. It heals my acne super fast and my skin feels soft and looks glowy. The only thing is the bottle is super small so you definitely run out after a couple months of nightly use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE this. Been struggling with postpartum breakouts and now I hardly have a breakout and my face is clear from using it after two weeks of consistent use. You only need a very little amount.  I use in conjunction with Truly’s CBD masks and Huda’s moisturizer and my skin has never looked better. It’s expensive so I bought it on sale. You should definitely try it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So I never really write reviews but I have to for this. This has completely got rid of my hormonal adult acne, and I’m pretty sure this is the reason my post acne scars have faded as well. It smells bad but I really don’t care because the results are amazing so far

reviews.review_title: Game Changer for Acne & Oily Skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has completely changed my face! Love it. PLEASE SEAL THE PACKAGING!!!!! Recently I ordered a big bottle and it spilled in the box. Thank you Sephora for replacing it but it also could have ruined all the other items as well. Other than that, this and the Sleeping Oil are my new favs.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: amazing product! I've added this oil to my morning routine for about 2 weeks and I'm in love. I don't love the smell but the difference in my pores and blackheads is significant already. I'm excited to see my skin continue to improve with continued use. It's pricey, but you only need a few drops so goes a long way and will last. Worth every penny!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoy this product! I add a couple drops to my foundation and mix it up. Helps me not break out when using makeup (I used to always have a new blemish or 2 any time I wore makeup)

reviews.review_title: Breakout Improved Overnight.Gone Sooner Than Usual
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have sensitive, combo (oily-leaning), dehydrated skin. I get hormonal breakouts and if I dare fall asleep without washing my face one night I'll definitely wake to a breakout. As I get situational acne, if you will, applying this daily and all over is too much for my skin but when applied directly to my breakouts, I see improvement literally overnight and they're gone a day or 2 sooner than usual. Pure tea tree oil is too strong for my sensitive skin and scarred my cheek for months the first time I used it but though tea tree is in this oil, I've had no adverse reactions.

reviews.review_title: This is your sign to buy it!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I never write reviews but this stuff is magical! I’ve been using it for about 2 weeks now and my skin has cleared up so much and it’s even getting rid of some acne spots that I once had. I highly recommend it! I have an oily t-zone and it doesn’t feel greasy at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Really like it and will repurchase. Not totally sure how much it cures acne as I used it after being on acutane but I enjoy using it so will continue to buy. Worth a try!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: So the product is super oily ofc and it does leave your skin oily but i feels so good on the skin and makes your skin feel suuuper soft after. I have large, super oily skin with a lot of blackhead and whitehead and after two weeks of using this I've seen improvement. Not as many black and white head like before and my pores are visibly smaller. I;m in love! It does have a sort of strong sent but not that bad. But if u are senative to sent than u wont like this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Maybe this product does wonders for the skin, but the SMELL... Oh my! I could absolutely not get over it. My boyfriend wouldn't let me approach him whilst I had this on haha. It smells like old compost juices. The worst smelling product I ever tried.

reviews.review_title: It took me years to come back & give it a chance!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: PLEASE give this a chance!!! Years ago I tried this a few times and it would instantly break me out even more than I already was. I’d immediately put it away. I’ve come back to it years later and it is single-handedly the ONLY thing that have SAVED my skin and reversed my acne. Don’t know how but it did. I started out using it once a week, now I use it twice everyday, morning and night. Within the first few days my skin was already looking better, and this is with acne around my chin and bumps on my forehead mostly. I used to have very oily skin and now I’m more on the normal to dry side, so maybe that’s why it works better now. I can tell a huge difference if I go a day without it, my skin craves it now. I don’t know if that’s a good or bad thing lol but it’s never leaving my side.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I used this product for just over a week and already seeing the results! I added this into my night skincare routine. After wash, essence, and serum, I use this oil and guasha. If you have acne prone skin, I highly recommend this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve only been using this for 4 days but I have seen great results. I don’t have acne but I do get hormonal breakouts on my chin and I recently had a facial that has my chin purging so this was recommended. The smell is very earthy, like basil and moss. It does go away after a minute or two and I do like earthy scents so that’s not a dealbreaker, but if you’re sensitive to scents or really hate earthy/herbal scents, you might not like this. My chin breakout is slowly clearing up and the pores on my nose and cheek area are almost nonexistent. This really does make my face look clearer and it’s non drying. A little goes a long way, so 3 drops in the AM and PM will do

reviews.review_title: I couldn’t get over the smell.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like Sunday Riley products, I’m even ok with how the Saturn mask smells, but I cannot stomach the way this oil smells. It might be an awesome product that works perfectly, but I will never know as it literally makes me nauseous. Was only able to keep it on my face for 3 hours, with a very strong scented candle next to me. Had to wash it off before going to bed as I would not be able to go to sleep with the smell.  (I am ok with tea tree oil and sulfur lotion/cream smell. This is like a tea tree oil and sulfur cream was lit on fire next to trash. But I do have a sensitive nose.)  If you like Sunday Riley and do not have a sensitive nose, or are not affected by smell, I would still recommend trying.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love it  It’s changed my skin and I recommend to literally EVERYONE no cap

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was breaking out out of the blue really badly and nothing would help! My sister recommended this and it has truly saved my skin. No more breakouts!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Changed my skin. This is now a staple in my skin care routine

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love it! I keep repurchasing it. Love to use it with my gua sha

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Day 3 of Usage:  Product is slightly on the “thicker” and “heavier” side for oils.  Green in colour which suits the “UFO” theme. Very light scented but the scent isn’t the greatest overall. Does not leave a “greasy” residue on my face. Absorbs into my skin efficiently.  Leaves my skin looking more refreshed with a more natural glow.  A small amount goes a long way.  Leaves skin feeling soft after applying.   I can’t speak too much on this product just yet as it has only been three days but I do admire this product and had no issues as of yet. I think I am already preferring it over the Phoenix Face Oil by Herbivore which says a lot.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was nervous to try this as it was an oil that I was previously using that initially clogged my pores, but after reading that this one is a dry oil, that pulls gunk out of your pores, I decided to give it a try. Gosh, am I happy I did. I had very clogged pores and some small white acne on my forehead.  This little miracle product dissolved it all. I put it on my face at night, and by morning I can actually see the stuff lifting out of my pores. Very impressed!! I have dry, sensitive skin so I ended up mixing three drops of UFO the CEO Sunday Riley Nourishing vitamin C cream to prevent any potential dryness from occurring. The Combo works wonders for me and I wake up with moisturized and clear skin. It’s expensive yes, but this stuff actually does work and a little goes a long way so it will last a long time. This is now a forever staple in my vanity

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a product I have used for years. It’s a staple in my skincare routine. I’ve found that when I am not using it my skin just doesn’t look as good and I find myself getting more breakouts. I’m not going to sit here and lie, I do have pretty decent skin, I don’t have severe acne or really any acne at all I get the occasional breakout when I’m on my period but for the most part my skin is clear but I have always found that if I don’t incorporate this into my routine my skin just isn’t the same. The smell at first is weird and some may not be able to get past it but I can say after 8 years of frequent use my skin really thanks me for adding this product to my routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Didn’t work for me, I have very dry skin, and it almost just wouldn’t absorb. However, I gave it to my sister who has oily and acne prone skin and she has had amazing results.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This oil came in a very nice package, the bottle was pretty as well but that's about the only thing that really stood out to me about this product. I had very high hopes for this based on the hype I had seen from it on the internet and the price point. However, this left my face unchanged and somewhat worse after a week of using this. It has a terrible smell that I was okay with if the product would have worked. Even though this is an oil it still left my face extremely oily, like too oily... unlike other face oils I have used in the past. It also did not help with any acne and made my skin texture very bumpy and gross. Using this at night also made my skin texture horrible in the morning.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: the only thing that cleared my skin and i have tried everything else

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used to get really bad pimples on my cheeks and chin but after using this every morning my face has cleared up and I rarely get pimples anymore, makes your skin feel so soft

reviews.review_title: 5 months of use, really no effects.
reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've had this since late September (it's March) and have been using it a few times a week since. I have normal type skin and I've noticed truly no difference to my skin and it hasn't done anything for my acne. It hasn't done anything negative, it's just truly so neutral of an experience. I'm near the end of the smaller size bottle and won't be repurchasing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this oil. I have all of them from Sunday Riley. It makes my skin feel so soft and youthful. I layer this with the Vitamin C oil and it helps give my skin a nice glow. It isn't greasy to me and is absorbed well. I would definitely recommend this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a must have, I apply it at night and the little bumps disappear the next day ..I have never used a product that works so well. It amazing...I only use it whn I feel a pimple coming or during my periods as a precaution and it works beautifully. I'm on my second bottle!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased this after a random breakout all over my forehead (later realized it was my hair products). Even though my skin type leans more oily, I could visibly see that my pimples were smaller and less red after the first use. I've used it a night and during the day under spf and both situations work well. A little goes a long way. It's been a couple weeks and my skin is clearing up with no new breakouts!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely LOVE this product. It leaves my skin baby smooth and has fully cleared my skin of acne. I’m extremely happy with this product and will definitely repurchase!!!

reviews.review_title: actually the worst product I’ve ever used
reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to try this but was sorely disappointed. This is truly the worst skincare product I have ever used. It absolutely stinks. People describe it as “earthy” but it’s horrible. You don’t get used to it. It is extremely greasy and doesn’t absorb. I have super dry skin and this was like smearing oily sticky goo on. If this had done something amazing for my skin I could at least give it some credit. But I used almost the whole bottle and never saw any difference. Except the oily ness did make me break out. And I had to wash anything that touched my face because it stunk so bad. You cannot put this on and leave your house. It reeks even from a distance!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I personally love face oils and they work really well with my face. While this oil does smell like taco seasoning ( because it contains cumin seed) it does help calm my breakouts overnight.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Feels greasy, smells awful, didn’t work- still broke out just the same. I gave it 3 weeks of use morning and night and washed with Beste.  Used good genes every few nights to fade darks spots from breakouts past. Still had blackheads daily. Still broke out hormonally on schedule. This didn’t even help with swelling, so more dark spots. Useless for me

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Got this from a friend who suggested it to me. I have sensitive skin and this caused me to breakout wherever I applied this(mainly my jawline). It also doesn’t smell the best, but had it helped my skin I probably would’ve gotten over that. Would not recommend to anyone with sensitive skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I first bought the 15ml because I wanted to try it out. It completely transformed my skin texture. Eventhough it is pricey, I had to get the bigger size because it is truly worth every penny. Some people may hate the scent but I really love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This oil made my skin break out a lot. And why does it smell like tacos? I had high hopes for this. My skin is breakout prone, and I can't use oil on my face. This oil was no different from any other facial oil that gave me breakouts, and it's over- priced.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is not a miracle product but it WORKS!   I’ve used this product for 3 years straight now, and earlier this month I stopped using it (all in all, stopped for around 3 weeks). I had been dealing with a breakout and for some reason I thought it might be my SR UFO. Oh ho ho was I wrong! My skin has rapidly declined, for the first time in ages I was getting clogged pores and tiny little irritating whitehead pimples around my nose and between my eyebrows. I mean ALL over. Ultimately I started using it again and everything cleared right up. I had a really poor diet (around the holidays), and hit my time off the month and I suspect that’s what actually caused my breakout. I will never doubt this oil again!  Like I said, this is not a miracle product, but used in conjunction with a healthy skincare routine it is a wonderful, clearing product and I would highly recommend! 10/10

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My skin really doesn’t tolerate salicylic acid well. I have dry skin so my skin gets red and flakey when I usually apply. The oil formulation really intrigued me. I still only apply where needed as a spot treatment and leave it on  for a few hours if I know I’m not going anywhere and then I use a super gentle cleanser on my FOREO to buff away my blackheads. The scent is strong and reminds me of tea tree oil. I don’t like that the product has colour. I get that it’s to combat the appearance of redness but still, I don’t like to have dyes marinating on my face throughout the day. Overall it’s pretty good and not as drying as other products because it’s an oil.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Was recommended this by my sister. I like it I haven't been using it long enough for it to have made a difference but it literally smells like grass I hate it
